s.text: They were a barbaric race, and their custody of the area brought about a dark period during which the written word was forgotten and art disappeared.
Homer wrote his epic works on Chios; and lyrical poetry was much admired, particularly the work of the poets Archilochos on Paros and Sappho on Lesvos.
